PGI.entry: Water balance errors followed by (negative conc. in ch4tran), then tries (-10^-12 .lt. smin_nh4 .lt. 0. resetting to zero.), then it exits at approximately 9 months. This same test passes with yellowstone_intel and frankfurt_intel

NAG.entry: Water balance errors followed by (negative conc. in ch4tran), then tries (-10^-12 .lt. smin_nh4 .lt. 0. resetting to zero.), then it exits at approximately 9 months. This same test passes with yellowstone_intel and frankfurt_intel

INTEL.entry: See (ERH_D.f19_g16.I1850CLM45CN.yellowstone_pgi.clm-default
Can't find user datasets
Seg fault while writing h1 file
See ERS_Ld211_D_P112x1.f10_f10.ICNCROP in yellowstone intel list
use before define in history. runs with frankfurt_pgi, yellowstone_intel and yellowstone_pgi
Seg fault while writing h1 file. This used to pass on yellowstone, but it failed on edison; now it is failing on yellowstone, too (it fails in clm4_5_37, too).
Diffs in cpl log files in rofl, rofi and volr

PGI.entry: Diffs in cpl log files in rofl, rofi and volr

NAG.entry: Sometimes runs out of wallclock time
Sometimes passes, sometimes fails. MPI error with > 1 pe. works with mpi-serial which is the normal use case for this setup.
